mapper.update:
update T_JS_GDCZ
RJE = #{rje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SJE = #{sje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GSSJ = #{gssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RJCZFS = #{rjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RJCZE = #{rjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RJCZRQ = #{rjczrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SJCZFS = #{sjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJCZE = #{sjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SJCZRQ = #{sjczrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GD = #{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BGRQ = #{bgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update T_JS_GDCZ set RJE = #{rje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SJE = #{sje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GSSJ = #{gssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RJCZFS = #{rjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJCZE = #{rjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RJCZRQ = #{rjczrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJCZFS = #{sjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SJCZE = #{sjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SJCZRQ = #{sjczrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GD = #{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BGRQ = #{bgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: select 'false' as QUERYID, from T_JS_GDCZ where xydm=(select a.hcdw_xydm from t_hcrw a where a.id=#{hcrwId})
